languages.text: "Не резню — Правосудие. Его Правосудие. И ведома мне лишь одна радость — радость служения Ему".
"Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."
languages.original_text: "Не резню — Правосудие. Его Правосудие. И ведома мне лишь одна радость — радость служения Ему".

traits.locale_text: "Not carnage. Judgement. His judgement. And I know of no delight other than that of serving Him."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Not carnage. Judgement. His judgement. And I know of no delight other than that of serving Him."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no delight other than that of serving Him."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no delight other than that of serving Him."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “这并不是屠杀，而是审判，是神皇的审判。侍奉神皇就是最令我愉悦的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."

traits.locale_text: “这并不是屠杀，而是审判，是神皇的审判。与侍奉神皇相比，没有任何事情能让我更加愉悦。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「殺戮ではなく裁きだ。主の裁き。私は主に仕える事以上に光栄な事は知らない」
languages.original_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."

traits.locale_text: 「殺戮ではなく裁きだ。主の裁き。私は主に仕える事以上に光栄な事は知らない」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «No carnicería, sino juicio. Su juicio. Y no conozco otro placer que el de servirle».
languages.original_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."

traits.locale_text: «No carnicería, sino juicio. Su juicio. Y no conozco otro placer que el de servirle».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Kein Gemetzel, Urteile. Sein Urteil. Und ich kenne kein anderes Vergnügen, als ihm zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."

traits.locale_text: "Kein Gemetzel, Urteile. Sein Urteil. Und ich kenne kein anderes Vergnügen, als ihm zu dienen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Je ne fais que rendre le jugement de l'Empereur, et je ne connais d'autre plaisir que celui de Le servir. »
languages.original_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne fais que rendre le jugement de l'Empereur, et je ne connais pas d'autre plaisir que celui de Le servir. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Katliam değil, adalet. O'nun adaleti. Ki ben, O'na hizmet etmekten daha büyük bir haz bilmem."
languages.original_text: "Not carnage, but judgement. His judgement. And I know of no other delight than serving Him."

traits.locale_text: "Katliam değil, adalet. O'nun adaleti. Ve ben O'na hizmet etmekten daha büyük bir haz bilmem."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
